marketingContentDescription.marketingText: Thank you for ordering from [storeName]. We received payment authorization for your order, number [orderNumber]. Use the following shipping tracking number to track this package: [trackingNumber]. If you are shipping items to other shipping addresses or using alternate shipping methods, you will receive a separate e-mail with those shipping details. If you have any questions or concerns about your order, you can contact us by e-mail at orders@[storeName].com or by phone at 1-800-555-1234. Thanks again for shopping at [storeName].
